FIELD.NAME: RESPONSE-STATUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the status of the Directive being processed

FIELD.NAME: TIME-COMPLETED
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time application completed processing the directive

FIELD.NAME: RETURN-VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Return value or status based on the RESPONSE-STATUS. Useful to provide function call status or error code in the case of failed completion

FIELD.NAME: DATA
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Additional data that may be desired along with the completion status
